column4: Wisconsin Superintendent of Public Instruction, Wisconsin Supreme Court

column1: “Shall section 1 of article III of the constitution, which deals with suffrage, be amended to provide that only a United States citizen age 18 or older who resides in an election district may vote in an election for national, state, or local office or at a statewide or local referendum?[6]”
